name: Heavens Waitingroom
description:
If you always wated to know what happens to people when they die sooner then it's planned for them than this game is the right choice. ;D


  • Travel through the darkness between plains and forest.
  • Watch the mood of your ghost switch as weather changes.
  • Find helpful items, pick locks, lure sheep, scare bats and more.

Your little ghost is full of hope that you will show him the path to heaven through heavens waitingroom.

But be aware of the dangers that linger in the dark!
